_header: Lady I thank Thee with heart swith mild
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: A prayer to the Virgin Mary — eight long lines in couplets with medial rhyme

CamTCC323.First Lines:
Leuedie ic þenke þe wid herte suiþe mildeÞat
                    gohid þat þu hauest idon me wid þine suete
                    childe…
CamTCC323.Last Lines:
…Moder loke one me wid þine suete eyenreste & blisse
                    gef þu me mi lehedi þen ic deyen
